history_text.scar: This cat is scarred from bravely defending the Clan against a dog.
history_text.reg_death: This cat died to keep c_n safe from a large dog.
history_text.lead_death: died to keep c_n safe from a large dog

comments: trigger_event are starting events for a story
when there is a story slot left all trigger_events are gathered to see one is fitting
constraint what is needed that this event can continue / the check can be made
roles defines which roles are needed for that event - schwer zu entscheiden
roles - for trigger_events it defines all roles in the story (oder auch nicht)
challenge - need an own class 4 sub categories - fight enemy (currently only skill check), find Item, find NPC, skill test, bypass
decide_cooldown wird definiert wann das n채chste Event getriggert wird - herunterz채hlen f채ngt erst ann wenn start_cooldown fertig ist
start_cooldown wird herunter gez채hlt, bis auf 0 ist, dann erschein das Event
